links.title: Setting up Grafana and InfluxDB for UPS monitoring on unRAID
How to setup Grafana, InfluxDB and Telegraf to monitor your unRAID system

targets.query: SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0000' AND "feature" = 'core_0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: The panel shows the growth of the fuse filesystem including any cache drives.

targets.query: SELECT last("used") FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" = '/mnt/user') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: $host - Data Growth Today

targets.query: SELECT last("free") AS "Free", last("used") AS "Used", last("total") AS "Total" FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" = '/rootfs/mnt/user') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"

panels.description: If a drive is spun down it will not show!
panels.title: $host - CPU S.M.A.R.T Temps

panels.description: See [This link](http://www.users.on.net/~fzabkar/HDD/Seagate_SER_RRER_HEC.html ) For an explanation on high error rate on Seagate drives

targets.query: SELECT last("read_error_rate") AS "Read Error Rate", last("seek_error_rate") AS "Seek Error Rate", last("udma_crc_errors") AS "UDMA CRC Errors", last("health_ok") AS "Health OK", last("temp_c") AS "Temp" FROM "smart_device" WHERE ("device" =~ /.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "model"
